sentences.en: ...the neo-Gothic buttresses of Riverside Church in Manhattan.
sentences.cn: …曼哈顿的里弗赛德教堂中的新哥特式扶璧。

sentences.en: A small turret or spire on a roof or buttress.
sentences.cn: 有以百叶窗遮蔽的钟塔和尖顶的教堂;装了绿色百叶窗的小别墅.

sentences.en: Its characteristic features include the pointed arch, the ribbed vault and the flying buttress.
sentences.cn: 其特点包括指出,拱, 肋跳马和飞行支墩.

sentences.en: Multi - arch dam is one of light buttress dams and its capping plate shows arch.
sentences.cn: 连拱坝是挡水盖板呈拱形的一种轻型支墩坝.

sentences.en: Ray hits Todd on his nose and buttress Gloria as she falls down.
sentences.cn: 雷一拳打在了托特的鼻子上,然后扶住了倒下来的格洛亚虚弱的身体.

sentences.en: Steel bracket tray, storing cage, material box, climb frame , small handcart , steel buttress piling etc.
sentences.cn: 钢制托盘 、 仓储笼 、 物料箱、登高车 、 小推车 、 钢制堆垛架等.

sentences.en: The evidence seemed to buttress their argument.
sentences.cn: 证据似乎支持他们的论点。

sentences.en: The law is by its very nature a buttress of the status quo . ( J . William Fulbright )
sentences.cn: 靠富布赖特奖学金求学.

sentences.en: The massive - head buttress dam has some attractive features for certain locations.
sentences.cn: 大头支墩坝对于某些地区仍有其值得注意的特色.

sentences.en: The trend that economic globalization and service trade liberalization complement and buttress each other is irreversible.
sentences.cn: 经济全球化与服务贸易自由化相辅相成、互相促进,其发展趋势不可逆转.

sentences.en: These accumulated over time , along with personal experiences, to buttress 2 my own developing sense of values.
sentences.cn: 这样的事日积月累, 再加上我的个人阅历, 让我逐渐形成了自己的价值观.

sentences.en: Those who say no have seen plenty of recent evidence to buttress their case.
sentences.cn: 那些回答“不”的人有很多最近的证据来支撑他们的观点.

sentences.en: To stabilize the building, the concrete walls next to the stairs are built as buttress walls.
sentences.cn: 为了稳定整个建筑, 靠近楼梯位置的混凝土墙设置了扶壁柱.

sentences.en: We have to buttress up the old church as it is beginning to lean.
sentences.cn: 我们必须加固这座古老的教堂,因为它开始倾斜了.

trans.tran_en: a brick or stone structure built to support a wall
to support a system, idea, argument etc, especially by providing money

trans.tran_cn: 支持，鼓励，用扶壁支撑，加固
trans.tran_en: to support a system, idea, argument etc, especially by providing money
